transform_def.name: ponyloafer
transform_def.string: let rotmat = mat2x2(cos(rotate), -sin(rotate), sin(rotate), cos(rotate)) r = weight / (length(p_in)) pony_out = vec2((p_in.x - p_in.y) * (p_in.x + p_in.y) / 2, p_in.x * p_in.y) * r n = rotmat * pony_out fx = (vec2(sinh(p_in.x * n.x) + sinh(p_in.y * n.y)).y) fy = (vec2(tanh(p_in.y * n.x) - tanh(p_in.x * n.y)).x) fr = (weight * (n.x * n.x + n.y * n.y)) * 2.0 in vec2(fy, fx) * fr
